keyEvents.title: Squard's Betrayal
keyEvents.description: Squard stabs Whitebeard on the Marineford battlefield, shocking both sides of the war.
keyEvents.significance: One of the most dramatic moments in the Battle of Marineford.

keyEvents.title: Ice Walls Destroyed
keyEvents.description: Whitebeard uses his powers to destroy the Marine's ice wall encirclement at Marineford.
keyEvents.significance: Changes the tactical situation of the battle and proves Whitebeard's commitment to his allies.

description: The Marine Headquarters where the execution of Ace and the Battle of Marineford take place.
